doc.title: Celtic Legends: Scottish Legends
doc.plot: The land which boasts the beauty of the Highlands, the majesty of the Central Lowlands and The Borders, and the sweeping valleys of the Clyde and Forth is rich in unique myths, legends and stories. These have been kept alive and nurtured by a proud people with a keen sense of their own history and culture. Features: " Robert the Bruce and the legend of the spider " Rob Roy " William Wallace " King James IV and the ghost of the field of Flodden " Bonnie Prince Charlie and the last of the Highland Clans
